title: [SOLVED]Mac Mini 820-2577-A White screen, no image
message:
Hi
Mac mini chimes but gives no display other than a white screen. Will not get to boot menue. 

Im trying to find a EFI BIN for this but no luck so far. Anyone else have suggestions? 
Thanks

title: [SOLVED]Mac Mini 820-2577-A White screen, no image
message: Bad HDD or memory slot? I believe these boards also work with a 820-2879 BIOS, but only for test and I'm not 100% sure. Make sure you have a backup!

title: [SOLVED]Mac Mini 820-2577-A White screen, no image
message:
Got the correct Bios and now all is good :).
Thanks though!
